name: The Coming Day
description:
First Game - Yogscast Game Jam Entry

This is my first game. I started to learn using Game Maker Studio 2 simply so that I could make a start on learning how to make games, and enter the Yogscast Game Jam.

There is a lot that I could not do that I wanted to do with this game due to time and skill, but I felt it was important that I finish this in time for the jam.
